pages.text: The way you summon $(item)Raids$() is changed in $(thing)Crucial 2$(). In order to summon a raid, you must now get an $(item)Omninous Banner$(), like how you would normally. You must then place the banner down and burn it with $(item)Flint and Steel$().$(br2)Additionally, you may notice raids have some more pillager variety to keep you on your toes...

pages.title: Burning a Banner
pages.text: Burning a banner, as well as a new foe.
